foodItems.name: Idli
foodItems.description: Idli is a south Indian Breakfast item
foodItems.recipe: Idli Recipe: Soak 1 cup urad dal and 3 cups idli rava over night. Grind the dal and then mix the rava in it. Let it ferment for 8 hours. Then pour the mixture in idli stand and cook for 15-20 mins on steam. Idli will be ready.

foodItems.name: Dosa
foodItems.description: Dosa is a south Indian Breakfast item
foodItems.recipe: Dosa Recipe: Soak 1 cup urad dal and 3 cups rice over night. Grind the dal and rice together. Let it ferment for 8 hours. Then pour the mixture on tava and cook on both sides. Dosa will be ready.

foodItems.name: Wada
foodItems.description: Wada is a south Indian Breakfast item
foodItems.recipe: Wada Recipe: Soak 1 cup urad dal for 4 hours. Grind the dal. Keep it in refrigirator for 10 mins. Make Wada shapes and fryin oil till golden color. Wada will be ready.

foodItems.name: Poori
foodItems.description: Poori is a south Indian Breakfast item
foodItems.recipe: Poori Recipe: Take 1 cup wheat flour and mix with water to make dough. Rest the dough for 30 mins. Make pooris and fry in Oil. Poori will be ready
